title: I like the yasuo vs riven story and hope these events happen more often
body: To be honest, I could care less about the mission rewards unless it was a skin or something, but the story is neat and being able to determine the outcome feels good as well. Hopefully the loser is killed off like when GP exited for a few weeks a couple years ago.

replies.body:
Our game is all about conflict - it's the core of competitive gaming! We are excited to see how the community responds to this event.

I'd love to see more 'vs' narratives in the future.
I can only imagine that having the missions tech set up makes this about 15x easier as well.
Yeah this is the culmination of a special team that's been working hard on this stuff, but was gated by the launch of the new client. Now they can do all kinds of cool things!
Im amazed by the speed too. The item set creator wasn't even on your radar so I was expecting it to come back more than a year later.
